## SecretToolBackend class

Linux secret-tool (Secret Service API) backend.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class SecretToolBackend implements SecretBackend 
```
**Implements:** [SecretBackend](./vaultkeeper.secretbackend.md)

## Remarks

Only available on Linux with secret-tool installed. Requires a running Secret Service (e.g., GNOME Keyring or KWallet with Secret Service plugin).
